participant_1.background:
I want a home where I can have my own music studio and a big backyard for my family to play baseball in.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
I am always learning new things and trying to improve my skills, but I am not always confident in my abilities.

participant_2.background:
I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
i enjoy watching tennis and golf on tv.
i have two pitt bulls.
i have been to a few renaissance fairs.
I am a social butterfly and love to meet new people, but I'd be terrible at being a tour guide.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, watching tennis and golf on tv, and going to renaissance fairs.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to practice bird calls, but I'm not very good at it.
That's interesting! I've never met anyone who practices bird calls before.
I guess it's not a very common hobby. I do it to try to connect with nature and learn more about the birds in my area.
That's a great reason to do it! I love nature too. I have two pit bulls that I love to take for walks in the park.
I've never had a pit bull, but I've heard they're great dogs.
They are! They're very friendly and loving. I'm glad you're a dog person.
Me too! I love dogs. They're the best.
